DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify the useof birth control pills currently, in the past, or never.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a women's use of oral contraceptives, usually hormonal, taken orally in order to block ovulation and prevent the occurrence of pregnancy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Compounds, usually hormonal, taken orally in order to block ovulation and prevent the occurrence of pregnancy. The hormones are generally estrogen or progesterone or both.

Concepts.definition: An agent taken orally to prevent conception.

Property.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus._The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Required; necessary, not optional.: The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.

Concepts.definition: Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).: To put into action or service.

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).
To put into action or service.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Concept annotation added for UPitt/TCGA.  Ylu, 01/30/2015.

PermissibleValues.value: Yes, taken in the past not using now

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.: To put into action or service.: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: To put into action or service.
The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.: To put into action or service.: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
To put into action or service.
The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus.:The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The birth control method that utilizes external source of sex hormones to prevent pregnancy by interfering with the ovulation, fertilization or implantation of the fertilized egg in the uterus.
The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Released per approval by S.Shakour. mc 8/31/11

ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you ever taken oral contraceptives "the pill"?
